## Context and Problem Statement

Flutter does not have the ability to render apps from JSON as well as to perform any Hot Updates. That means that we cannot keep any apps in the core build and also that we need some Flutter solution for defining the apps in a for of JSON.

## Decision Drivers

- Flexible
- Actively maintained
- Open for extensions
- Allowing for creating dynamically changed actions


## Considered Options

- [json_dynamic_widget](https://pub.dev/packages/json_dynamic_widget)
- [dynamic_widget](https://pub.dev/packages/dynamic_widget)

## Decision Outcome

Chosen option: "json_dynamic_widget", because of the ability to define custom values & functions. The ability to subscribe for value stream as well as the overall possibilities of that library makes it a perfect fit for our needs. We also are contributing to that project because their growth is in our best interest.

## Pros and Cons of the Options

### json_dynamic_widget

- Good, because it has flexible custom values & functions model
- Good, because it is actively maintained
- Good, because it allows to define dynamic actions like add, remove, edit via [json_dynamic_builder](https://github.com/peiffer-innovations/json_dynamic_widget/blob/main/lib/src/builders/json_dynamic_builder.dart)
- Good, because we are contributing there
- Bad, because there is no possibility to convert Flutter Widgets to JSON, they have to be manually written

### dynamic_widget

- Good, because has the ability to convert Flutter Widgets to JSON
- Bad, because it is not open to extensions and their functionality is limited rather to just showing views and data
